1.0.0.name: wordpress/wp-addonchat
1.0.0.description:
Ready to integrate AddonInteractive's AddonChat software into your site? Then this is the plugin for you. With the simple addition of an easy to remember shortcode, you can pop the chat room into your site in any page or post that you want.

In addition to integrating your chat room quickly and easily, you can add a way for site visitors to see "Who's Chatting" in your chatroom. For your convenience, the "Who's Chatting" functionality is provided both as a widget and a standalone template tag.
